type.range_type.name: тип воскрешения

0 for effective in range when in normal state.
1 for effective in range when present on the stage.
2 for effective for allies once passed the range as long as it is on the stage.
3 for effective for allies once passed the range forever

dis.name: дистанция
dis.tooltip: Distance from this entity by default, distance from the target if on hit or on kill is enabled

mult.name: множитель
mult.tooltip: Buff of the summoned entity, relative to this entity by default, fixed buff if you enable fix buff

type.anim_type.name: анимация призыва
tooltip: summon animation, 0 for no animation, 1 for warp animation,
2 for burrow animation, 3 for burrow animation and disable further burrow.
The summoned entity must have burrow animation in order to use 2 or 3.

type.ignore_limit.name: игнорируется лимит
type.ignore_limit.tooltip: ignore the stage entity limit. Be careful with this, don't summon too much. It can break the game

type.fix_buff.name: фиксированный слой
tooltip: Use fixed buff instead of relative buff.
Ex: 200% summoner and 300% buff would mean 600% buff if fix buff is disabled and 300% buff if fix buff is enabled

type.same_health.name: такое же здоровье
type.same_health.tooltip: Set the summoned entity to have the same health as this entity.

type.random_layer.name: случайный слой
type.random_layer.tooltip: By default, summoned entity will have the same layer as this entity. Enable this to make the layer randomized.

type.on_hit.name: при ударе
tooltip: Summon if and only if this attack hits targets.
Summon per target attacked, distance origins are set to the targets' positions.
Multiple summon possible for ranged attack.

type.on_kill.name: при убийстве
tooltip: Summon if and only if this attack kills targets.
Summon per target killed, distance origins are set to the targets' positions.
Multiple summon possible for ranged attack.

form.name: Форма
form.tooltip: Set which form of the unit you want to summon. Only applicable on Cat Units.

format: начиная с расстояния (dis) от этого существа

BARRIER.tooltip: Blocks all damage lower than the barrier's HP. Will break if an attack deals more damage than it's HP

regentime.name: Время Восстановления
regentime.tooltip: The entity's barrier will regenerate after a period of time passes. Set to 0 to deactivate this ability.

timeout.name: Тайм-аут
timeout.tooltip: The entity's barrier will break after a period of time passes. Set to 0 to deactivate this ability.

type.magnif.name: Используется множитель
type.magnif.tooltip: Activate this to make barrier's HP affected by the entity's HP magnification.

regen.name: восстановление
regen.tooltip: Percentage of the base HP it regenerates upon HB

SHIELDBREAK.tooltip: Directly breaks Aku shield. Be aware that this doesn't prevent shield from regenerating when hitbacked.

format: (prob)% шанс на контр-атаку, наносит (damage)% [(!type.useOwnDamage){урона, полученного от удара}(type.useOwnDamage){урона от урона юнита}] обратно противнику.
[(type.counterWave!=0){ Этот юнит также [(type.counterWave==1){контратакакует}(type.counterWave==2){отражает}] волновую/сурдж атаку. }][(type.procType!=0){Эта контратака
[(type.procType==1|type.procType==3){имеет}(type.procType==2){заменяет}] оригинальные способности атаки[(type.procType==2){ на способности юнита}(type.procType==3){ и спосности врага}]. }]
Эта контратака бьёт [(type.areaAttack){ всех врагов}(!type.areaAttack){ только атакующего}][(type.areaAttack|!type.outRange){[(!type.areaAttack){ если они}] стоят
[(minRange!=0|maxRange!=0){(minRange) ~ (maxRange) дальности юнита от этой сущности}(minRange==0&maxRange==0){на дальности сущности}]}].

damage.name: Урон%
damage.tooltip: The percentage of damage to reflect when getting hit.

minRange.name: Слепая зона
minRange.tooltip: The counter won't hit anything standing below this number. Leave this and Max Range in 0 to use the unit's normal range.

maxRange.name: Макс. дальность
maxRange.tooltip: The counter will hit anything standing below this number. Leave this and Blindspot in 0 to use the unit's normal range.

type.procType.name: Тип Способности
type.procType.tooltip: The parameter here affects how attack procs are handled. 0 = Removes all procs. 1 = Reflects all procs back to the attacker. 2 = Replaces all the attack's procs with this unit's procs. 3 = Uses both this entity and the attacker's procs. Useless if there's a hit registered as counter

type.counterWave.name: Counter Waves
type.counterWave.tooltip: Toggle response when hit with a Wave or Surge. 0 = Do Nothing. 1 = Counter. 2 = Reflect.

type.useOwnDamage.name: Использует Собств. Урон
type.useOwnDamage.tooltip: Use this unit's damage for counters instead of received damage.

type.outRange.name: Игнорирует Дистанцию
type.outRange.tooltip: Toggle this on and the unit will counter regardless of how far away the attacker is.

type.areaAttack.name: Атака по Области
type.areaAttack.tooltip: Toggle this on and the counter will target all units in the counter's range. If left off, only the attacker will receive damage.
